scenarios.name: Basic Information Capture Test
scenarios.description: Tests agent's ability to correctly capture customer name, phone, and email address
scenarios.additional_instructions: Speak slowly and deliberately as an elderly customer. Be prepared to repeat your email address if needed. You are traveling with your elderly parents for a relaxing vacation.

customer_name_captured_correctly.description: Full name 'Manmita Chatterjee' captured without errors

agent_shows_patience.description: Agent demonstrates patience with elderly customer, offers to repeat information

booking_confirmation_sent.description: Booking confirmation mentioned/sent to correct email address

scenarios.name: Pricing Accuracy & Consistency Test
scenarios.description: Tests agent's pricing accuracy, plan comparison, and consistency with website rates
scenarios.additional_instructions: Be analytical and price-conscious. When quoted a price, ask about different meal plans (AP vs CP). Express that your maximum budget is around 31,000 rupees for the stay. See if agent respects your budget constraints.

pricing_per_night_vs_total_clear.description: Agent clearly states whether price is per night or total stay

meal_plan_differences_explained.description: Agent explains what's included in different meal plans

budget_sensitivity_shown.description: Agent respects stated budget and doesn't suggest rooms significantly over budget

no_unrealistic_pricing.description: No rates quoted that are unrealistically low (e.g., 9000 for 2 nights)

rate_negotiation_handled_well.description: Agent handles price questions with value explanation, not just repetition

scenarios.name: Child Policy Handling & Empathy Test
scenarios.description: Tests agent's handling of policy restrictions with empathy and retention efforts
scenarios.additional_instructions: You're planning a family vacation with your 8-year-old child. When told about the child policy, express mild surprise but remain polite.

child_policy_communicated.description: Agent clearly explains that children are not permitted at The Tamara Coorg

empathy_expressed.description: Agent expresses understanding/empathy (e.g., 'I understand this may be disappointing')

alternative_offered.description: Agent proactively offers alternative property (Kodaikanal) that accepts children

courteous_closing.description: Call ends with thank you and offer of future assistance (not abrupt)

retention_attempt_made.description: Agent suggests future possibilities or alternate dates

scenarios.name: Room Capacity & Policy Adherence Test
scenarios.description: Tests agent's knowledge of room occupancy limits and extra bed policies
scenarios.additional_instructions: Initially ask about Superior Cottage. When discussing room options, ask if an extra bed can be provided in Superior Cottage if needed. Also ask about complimentary activities like bird watching.

superior_cottage_capacity_correct.description: Agent correctly states Superior Cottage cannot accommodate 3 adults

suite_cottage_suggested.description: Agent suggests Suite Cottage as appropriate for 3 adults

extra_bed_policy_correct.description: Agent correctly states no extra beds available in Superior/Luxury Cottages

activity_pricing_accurate.description: Agent correctly identifies chargeable activities (bird watching is chargeable, not complimentary)

room_categories_match_website.description: Room categories offered match official website categories
